100585.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「じ:

118066.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「や:

100586.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「ま:

100587.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「あ:

100598.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「あ:

100599.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「で:

100600.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「も:

100601.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「ま:

100602.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「…: <start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>I believe you.<stop_lip_animation n03561 CLOSE_MOUTH>

100591.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「ま:
<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>First, you need to kill 3
<%sev_que_name0> in Upper Jule Island,
Wena Islands.<stop_lip_animation n03561 CLOSE_MOUTH>

100592.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「た:
However, it is not enough to just defeat them. You must perform the Dance of Sealing on the enemy, and
defeat them while the effect is still active.

100593.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「３:
When you've killed three of them, you'll know a special dance to call upon the ancient legendary "Note God
of Dance.

100594.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「そ:
If you dedicate that dance on one of the nine small stages that dot the northern part of King Ladis Island in
the Wena Islands, the one farthest from wisdom, you will be the first to know that you are dancing on the most
beautiful stage in the whole of the world.

100595.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「伝:
It will open the way to the Hall of Lore. There, if the God of Dance deems you worthy, he will grant you a
talisman.

100596.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「踊:
God of Dance is so strong and fierce that he is nicknamed the "God of Dance". It's not easy to be accepted,
but I'm sure you'll be fine.

100597.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>Good luck. I'm going to go train so
that I don't lose to you. The day of
the battle is near!<stop_lip_animation n03561 CLOSE_MOUTH>

100603.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「よ:
<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>Welcome, dancer. Oops, I can't see
your face like this.<stop_lip_animation m50106 CLOSE_MOUTH>

100604.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「な:

100605.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「で:
But! I, Dance God Bonita, a.k.a. "Aragami" (God of Roughness), am so lovingly rough and tumble. How can you

100606.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「ラ:

100610.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「こ:

100611.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「い:

100613.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「あ:
<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>Oh, no. You're a fool to come back

100614.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「あ:

100616.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「あ:

100617.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「で:

100618.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「そ:

100619.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「踊:

100620.<start_lip_sync m50106 _normal m00001>「そ:

100649.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「さ:

100635.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「…:

100637.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「荒:

100638.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「私:

100639.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「け:

100640.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「私:
<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>I am <pc>. I think we should
be the last ones to dance the

100641.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「私:
For generations, my family has thrown itself into the fight against the Hell King and fallen in battle. It was our
family's mission, our destiny.

100642.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「で:
But, after all, dancing and performing with my companions was the happiest time of my life. I was happiest when I
was dancing and performing with my companions.

100643.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「ご:
My ancestors would be angry if they heard it. But I am very happy that there are more and more dancers like
that now. That's why

100644.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「世:
For the sake of the happiness of dancers all over the world, the Hell King must be defeated and the exorcism
dance must be forgotten as an old legend.

100645.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>I look forward to the day when I can
dance the Deity Dance with you. Let's
do our best for each other.<stop_lip_animation n03561 CLOSE_MOUTH>
